title: WINERACK
descrption: WINERACK is a backdoor used by APT37. [1]

references.title: FireEye. (2018, February 20). APT37 (Reaper): The Overlooked North Korean Actor. Retrieved March 1, 2018.

related.Name: Command-Line Interface
related.Use: WINERACK can create a reverse shell that utilizes statically-linked Wine cmd.exe code to emulate Windows command prompt commands.[1]

related.Name: File and Directory Discovery
related.Use: WINERACK can enumerate files and directories.[1]

related.Name: System Information Discovery
related.Use: WINERACK can gather information about the host.[1]

related.Name: System Owner/User Discovery
related.Use: WINERACK can gather information on the victim username.[1]
